title: Project-Based Learning Course to Improve Physicians' E-Learning Readiness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms and intermediate-level language domain knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based course in language education conducted in a BYOD environment, focusing on comprehensively developing learners' technological competencies and adaptability to online culture

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and implement language-learning projects using e-learning platforms and digital tools.
Learners can concretely apply strategies for effective communication and collaboration in online learning environments.
Learners can diagnose and improve their technical competencies and attitudes by analyzing e-learning readiness assessment tools (surveys/interviews).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
